name: WordPerfect Form
summary: Learn about .WPF files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: WordPerfect users who want to distribute the same document to multiple people, but customize the document so it contains each recipient's name, address, and/or other information, can do so using a mail merge. To perform a mail merge, a user:
Imports a data source that includes recipients' information.
Creates a form that contains their document's text and field codes that WordPerfect uses to insert recipients' information.

The form a user creates as part of this process is saved as a WPF file. When a user finalizes their mail merge, WordPerfect uses the imported data source and WPF file to create a series of customized WordPerfect documents.

instructions: You can open a WPF file with Corel WordPerfect (Windows). You can also open a WPF file with Microsoft Word (Windows, Mac).
